languages.text: "Я — лишь хрупкий цветок в вашей сильной руке, шерин. Я могу лишь дарить вам данный мне Великим аромат, пока не наскучу. Отбросьте меня прочь, и пусть палящий зной обратит меня в иссушенный саркофаг для чувства, что некогда было между нами".

"I am but a fragile flower in your mighty hand, shereen. I can only give you what fragrance the Exalted One has granted me until you tire of me. Cast me aside, and let the scorching heat turn me into a desiccated sarcophagus for the sentiment that once lay between us."
languages.original_text: "Я — лишь хрупкий цветок в вашей сильной руке, шерин. Я могу лишь дарить вам данный мне Великим аромат, пока не наскучу. Отбросьте меня прочь, и пусть палящий зной обратит меня в иссушенный саркофаг для чувства, что некогда было между нами".

traits.locale_text: "I am but a fragile flower in your mighty hand, shereen. I can only give you what fragrance the Exalted One has granted me until you tire of me. Cast me aside, and let the scorching heat turn me into a desiccated sarcophagus for the sentiment that once lay between us."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am but a fragile flower in your mighty hand, shereen. I can only give you what fragrance the Exalted One has granted me until you tire of me. Cast me aside, and let the scorching heat turn me into a desiccated sarcophagus for the sentiment that once lay between us."

traits.locale_text: "I am but a fragile flower in your mighty hand, shereen. I can only give you what fragrance the Exalted One has granted me until you tire of me. Cast me aside, and let the scorching heat turn me into a desiccated sarcophagus for the sentiment that once lay between us."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am but a fragile flower in your mighty hand, shereen. I can only give you what fragrance the Exalted One has granted me until you tire of me. Cast me aside, and let the scorching heat turn me into a desiccated sarcophagus for the sentiment that once lay between us."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Soy solo una flor frágil en su poderosa mano, shereen. Solo puedo ofrecerle el aroma que el Exaltado me ha dado hasta que se canse de mí. Écheme a un lado y deje que el calor abrasador me convierta en un sarcófago reseco que aloja el sentimiento que una vez compartimos».
languages.original_text: "I am but a fragile flower in your mighty hand, shereen. I can only give you what fragrance the Exalted One has granted me until you tire of me. Cast me aside, and let the scorching heat turn me into a desiccated sarcophagus for the sentiment that once lay between us."

traits.locale_text: «Soy solo una flor frágil en su poderosa mano, shereen. Solo puedo ofrecerle el aroma que el Exaltado me ha dado hasta que se canse de mí. Écheme a un lado y deje que el calor abrasador me convierta en un sarcófago reseco que aloja el sentimiento que una vez compartimos».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我只是你手中脆弱的花朵，亲爱的。我只能将至高无上的神皇赋予我的芬芳献给你，直到你厌倦我为止。等你把我弃置一旁之后，唯有让炙热的高温将我彻底烤干，方可祭奠我们间曾有过的激情。”
languages.original_text: "I am but a fragile flower in your mighty hand, shereen. I can only give you what fragrance the Exalted One has granted me until you tire of me. Cast me aside, and let the scorching heat turn me into a desiccated sarcophagus for the sentiment that once lay between us."

traits.locale_text: “我只是你手中脆弱的花朵，亲爱的。我只能将至高无上的神皇赋予我的芬芳献给你，直到你厌倦我为止。等你把我弃置一旁之后，唯有让炙热的高温将我彻底烤干，方可祭奠我们间曾有过的激情。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしはあんたの力強い手の中にある、もろい花でしないんだ、シャリーン。あたしにはエグザルテッド・ワンからもらった香りを捧げることしかできない。あんたが飽きるまでね。私を捨てて、かつてふたりの間にあった感情のような焼けつくような熱さであたしを乾いた棺に変えてちょうだい」
languages.original_text: "I am but a fragile flower in your mighty hand, shereen. I can only give you what fragrance the Exalted One has granted me until you tire of me. Cast me aside, and let the scorching heat turn me into a desiccated sarcophagus for the sentiment that once lay between us."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしはあんたの力強い手の中にある、もろい花でしないんだ、シャリーン。あたしにはエグザルテッド・ワンからもらった香りを捧げることしかできない。あんたが飽きるまでね。私を捨てて、かつてふたりの間にあった感情のような焼けつくような熱さであたしを乾いた棺に変えてちょうだい」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne suis qu'une fleur délicate entre vos mains puissantes, shereen. Tout ce que je peux faire, c'est exhaler le parfum que l'Exalté m'a donné jusqu'à ce que vous vous en lassiez. Si vous ne voulez plus de moi, puisse la chaleur brûlante me transformer en un sarcophage desséché où enterrer les sentiments qui nous unissaient autrefois. »
languages.original_text: "I am but a fragile flower in your mighty hand, shereen. I can only give you what fragrance the Exalted One has granted me until you tire of me. Cast me aside, and let the scorching heat turn me into a desiccated sarcophagus for the sentiment that once lay between us."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis qu'une fleur délicate entre vos mains puissantes, shereen. Tout ce que je peux faire, c'est exhaler le parfum que l'Exalté m'a donné jusqu'à ce que vous vous en lassiez. Si vous ne voulez plus de moi, puisse la chaleur brûlante me transformer en un sarcophage desséché où enterrer les sentiments qui nous unissaient autrefois. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin nur eine zerbrechliche Blume in Eurer mächtigen Hand, Shereen. Ich kann Euch nur den Duft schenken, mit dem der Erhabene mich gesegnet hat, bis Ihr meiner überdrüssig werdet. Werft mich beiseite und lasst mich von der sengenden Hitze in einen verdorrten Sarcophagus für die Gefühle verwandeln, die einst zwischen uns bestanden."
languages.original_text: "I am but a fragile flower in your mighty hand, shereen. I can only give you what fragrance the Exalted One has granted me until you tire of me. Cast me aside, and let the scorching heat turn me into a desiccated sarcophagus for the sentiment that once lay between us."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nur eine zerbrechliche Blume in Eurer mächtigen Hand, Shereen. Ich kann Euch nur den Duft schenken, mit dem der Erhabene mich gesegnet hat, bis Ihr meiner überdrüssig werdet. Werft mich beiseite und lasst mich von der sengenden Hitze in einen verdorrten Sarcophagus für die Gefühle verwandeln, die einst zwischen uns bestanden."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am but a fragile flower in your mighty hand, shereen. I can only give you what fragrance the Exalted One has granted me until you tire of me. Cast me aside, and let the scorching heat turn me into a desiccated sarcophagus for the sentiment that once lay between us."

languages.text: "Ben senin kudretli ellerindeki narin bir çiçekten başka bir şey değilim şirinim. Benden bıkana kadar sana verebileceğim tek şey, Görkemli'nin bana bahşettiği kokudur. Beni bırakırsan kavurucu sıcaklar, beni bir zamanlar aramızdaki o hislerin gömüleceği kupkuru bir lahde dönüştürür."
languages.original_text: "I am but a fragile flower in your mighty hand, shereen. I can only give you what fragrance the Exalted One has granted me until you tire of me. Cast me aside, and let the scorching heat turn me into a desiccated sarcophagus for the sentiment that once lay between us."

traits.locale_text: "Ben senin kudretli ellerindeki narin bir çiçekten başka bir şey değilim şirinim. Benden bıkana kadar sana verebileceğim tek şey, Görkemli'nin bana bahşettiği kokudur. Beni bir kenara bırak ve kavurucu sıcaklar beni, bir zamanlar aramızda olan o hislerin gömülü olduğu kupkuru bir lahite dönüştürsün."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
